interactivity.requirements: You must have seen or permanently missed the following Events: Seen " The Place She Falls Asleep At Night " from Sara Sakakibara
interactivity.to_get_this_event: Choose "Wait until morning" during an afternoon after seeing The Place She Falls Asleep At Night .
interactivity.to_miss_this_event: Not having a relationship with Sara before The Place She Falls Asleep At Night . Replaced by Bad Boy .

changelog: This Event was added in Update 0.21p2.

secret_information.description:
== Happy Event ==
This Event is a special event with a special trigger (check requirements). It may or may not contain non-English content.
